message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $10000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about $9750?  This would still be a great deal for you, and it would allow me to move closer to my desired price.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your position and would like to propose $9600 as a fair compromise.
